review_blob: Pretty, but lacks a good hop aroma. Aftertaste is harsh and slightly astringent. The aftertaste stayed with me way too long and was not pleasant. Id have expected better from this brewery.

Some people call the aroma "banana", I call it "nail polish remover". It knocks you out. Other beers of this style Ive tasted have been able to be a lttle more subtle and better balance their banana.... Couldnt finish my glass.

Ginger!!! WOW! How comw you people didnt pick it up? I love it! Sure, we dont usually find ginger in this style, but I find it refreshingly original. A great beer for the summer and not too much alcool to drink it in the afternoon.
